summary.span: 為文字行提供用來支援格式化服務的抽象類別。

span.span: Provides an abstract class for supporting formatting services to a line of text.

summary.span: 取得遭到分行符號處理序分行時的行狀態。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是`null`一行結尾的段落的結尾時。The return value is `null` when the line ends at the end of the paragraph. 文字格式子用戶端可能會傳回做為參數傳遞的傳回值方法，可以讓同一個段落的下一行的格式時所要使用的值。The text formatter client may pass the return value back as a parameter to the method, which allows the value to be used when formatting the next line within the same paragraph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值設定時，才屬性設定為，和單字是大於格式化的段落寬度。The property value is set only when the property of is set to , and a single word is wider than the formatting paragraph width. 在這種情況下，截斷遵守所要的行為所指定單字中間列設定。In such situation, truncates the line in the middle of the word to honor the desired behavior specified by setting.
